original_text: and behold, he has accused her of misconduct, saying, “I did not find in your daughter evidence of virginity.” And yet this is the evidence of my daughter's virginity.’ And they shall spread the cloak before the elders of the city.
korean_text: 비방거리를 만들어 말하기를 내가 네 딸에게서 처녀임을 보지 못하였노라 하나 보라 내 딸의 처녀의 표적이 이것이라 하고 그 부모가 그 자리옷을 그 성읍 장로들 앞에 펼 것이요

sentences.original_text: he has accused her of misconduct
I did not find in your daughter evidence of virginity
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 네 딸에게서 처녀성의 증거를 찾지 못했다

sentences.original_text: And yet this is the evidence of my daughter's virginity
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 이것이 내 딸의 처녀성 증거이다

sentences.original_text: And they shall spread the cloak
before the elders of the city
